name: alpine-component-loader
description: A lightweight, build-free component loader for Alpine.js.

scripts.compile-min: npx swc src/index.js -o dist/AlpineComponentLoader.min.js -C minify=true -C jsc.minify.mangle=true -C jsc.minify.compress=true -C jsc.minify.format.comments=some -s
scripts.compile-min-debug: npx swc src/debugger.js -o dist/ACLDebugger.min.js -C minify=true -C jsc.minify.mangle=true -C jsc.minify.compress=true -C jsc.minify.format.comments=some -s
scripts.compile-watch: npm run clean ; npm run compile-debug & npm run compile -- -w
scripts.serve: npm run clean ; npm run compile-watch & sleep 2 && npx reload -b
scripts.build: npm run clean ; npm run compile && npm run compile-min && npm run compile-debug && npm run compile-min-debug
